name: Eagle Graphite Incorporated
description: Eagle Graphite Incorporated is a resource company focused on the exploration and development of natural flake graphite resources in North America. Founded in 1995, the company is dedicated to the sustainable production of high-quality graphite products, which are essential for a variety of industries including battery manufacturing, automotive, and renewable energy technologies. Eagle Graphite operates the only natural flake graphite mine in the United States, located in Idaho, which positions it strategically within the growing market for electric vehicle batteries and energy storage solutions. The company emphasizes environmentally responsible mining practices and aims to minimize its ecological footprint while maximizing the efficiency of its operations. With a commitment to innovation and quality, Eagle Graphite is poised to play a vital role in the transition to a more sustainable future, as demand for graphite continues to rise globally due to its critical applications in modern technology, especially in lithium-ion batteries. The company is actively exploring additional opportunities to expand its resource base and enhance its production capabilities to meet increasing market demands.
ceo: Chris J. H. L. G. Greig

key_executives.name: Chris J. H. L. G. Greig

seo.meta_title: Eagle Graphite Incorporated | Sustainable Graphite Mining
seo.meta_description: Explore Eagle Graphite Incorporated, a leader in natural flake graphite production in North America, committed to sustainable mining practices and innovative solutions for modern technology.

faq.question: What does Eagle Graphite do?
faq.answer: Eagle Graphite is focused on the exploration and development of natural flake graphite resources.

faq.question: Where is Eagle Graphite headquartered?
faq.answer: Eagle Graphite is headquartered in Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada.

faq.question: What products does Eagle Graphite produce?
faq.answer: Eagle Graphite produces natural flake graphite and graphite concentrate.
